Welcome to Pycraft's update utility, here we will uninstall all of Pycraft's files as well as its additional data with the exception of your saved data, then reinstall the latest version.
The update utility will prompt for both accessing and downloading files from the internet and for the manipulation and removal of some of your files.

If an update is available then you can continue through the update utility, if not then you can return back to the 'Modify Your Install' screen.
